However, these losses are mitigated because market prices tend to rise.	Formatted: Indent: Left: 18 pt, No bullets or numbering, Tabs: Not at 67.5 pt Figure 5-5. Since most national security installations are owned by the federal government (e.g., military bases), EPA assumes these entities would not be considered small.
